help-file.title: GMOTD
help-file.content:
This command gives you your Guild Message Of The Day, otherwise known as the news flashes for your guild that you see when you log in.
Setting up your GMOTD: Only guild leaders are able to change and set your guild's GMOTD. To do this the leader writes the motd onto a piece of paper (which can be minor c'ed) and then type 'gmotd paper' to activate it. If you just type 'gmotd' or you are not a leader, it will show your current guild motd.
